text: RT @lpbradley: Johnny Depp's libel case has become as surreal as it is horrifying. https://t.co/o0bh2Yh39n

name: thedailybeast
text:

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @lachlan: 18 of the 20 donors to the super PAC have also donated to Jones' campaign. Asked whether it provided the group with fundraising leads, a campaign spox said "FEC guidance permits campaigns to provide information about prospective donors to interested PACs" https://t.co/XM1VveZWI4

text: RT @maddicharb: Moments after this statement, McEnany claimed that "the science is on our side" in fully reopening schools https://t.co/z0Cn57214E

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @MelissaHLeon: To do right by a fighter’s story, you hire a fighter to tell it. I spoke to Gina Prince-Bythewood about making THE OLD GUARD and the fight that’s driven her rise in Hollywood: https://t.co/ai4HFEeoaI

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @KELLYWEILL: The appearance of Proud Boys at a Philadelphia police union event last week was the latest time in weeks that the force was accused of being too close with right-wing groups: https://t.co/RXGyGvEwmA

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @sambrodey: The Senate battleground money picture, now that 2nd quarter reports are in, w/ @lachlan:

In 11 of 13 key races, Dems outraised Rs this quarter 

But GOP candidates still hold an overall cash advantage, with a total of $114M on hand to Dems' $87M

https://t.co/k30vUw5xwU

text: RT @lpbradley: As a fellow Gainesville native who once saw Ryan Lochte at a Tex-Mex chain, I felt obligated to write about his new documentary In Deep, and our empty obsession with "legacy." https://t.co/u4HDOccV8o

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @DeanObeidallah: Trump not only failed America, his actions in failing to warn
Americans about the known risks of Covid-19-and worse lying about them-are a crime. I make the case in my @thedailybeast why Trump should be charged with manslaughter: https://t.co/wUS5kZrjG9

name: thedailybeast
text:
It is through tears that the entire Daily Beast team says good-bye to our friend and colleague who has enhanced all of our lives for the better.

https://t.co/xEOWbUajpV

name: thedailybeast
text:
Chris, without you the world is a less curious, less brilliant, and poorer place. We will never forget you.

#RIP to our legendary world news editor: Chris Dickey (@csdickey). 

https://t.co/xEOWbUajpV

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @BLNadeau: This is the hardest story I have ever had to write about a dear colleague who is gone too soon. Legendary journalist and friend @csdickey has died in Paris and we at @thedailybeast are devastated.  https://t.co/8NX54jmumn

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @NoahShachtman: I have terrible news. Chris Dickey, the legendary foreign correspondent, has died suddenly in Paris of what seems to be heart failure. He was a mentor, a friend, a comrade-in-arms, and just about the best guy on the planet to meet in a cafe. https://t.co/cL0MJVTPVR

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @TimTeeman: My brilliant, inspiring, generous, urbane @thedailybeast colleague Chris Dickey (@csdickey) has died. As a longtime foreign correspondent and editor, he was everything a journalist should be. We are devastated. This excellent remembrance is by @BLNadeau. https://t.co/sNtzyRtiWi

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @rachelolding: Chris Dickey was the kind of journalist every journalist aspires to be like. Vale. https://t.co/1JdTzlGsHM

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @sarahnrogers: "The hardest thing about writing an obituary for Chris Dickey, the legendary foreign correspondent and my friend and colleague for more than 25 years, is not having him edit it."

fucking gutted by this beautiful remembrance by @BLNadeau 
https://t.co/vXItwJ3wne

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @ErinBanco: We love you, Chris.

https://t.co/RWUUFwgEd8

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @KELLYWEILL: Working with Chris was such an honor. He’s so loved and missed. https://t.co/xSyef5sEz7

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @TracyConnor: It was an incredible honor to work with Chris Dickey. I'm going to miss him so fucking much. Beautiful obit from his friend @BLNadeau  https://t.co/EVBTeLRu9p

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @Katie_M_Baker: Chris, I’ll miss your beautiful photos, your files, your guidance and your friendship. Your parting is a huge loss to the Beast and we’ll never forget you.  https://t.co/Xlojhq3XMz

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @kpfallon: Chris was a truly, genuinely kind man. Always had nice things to say about the silly stuff I was writing about, when meanwhile he was off literally covering global wars. It was always a trip to hear stories from him about the swanky Newsweek days. 
https://t.co/KPjBc0clzB

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @JFKucinich: This is just gutting. Rest In Peace.  https://t.co/tRcUKaMCUg

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @AndrewKirell: Absolutely heartbroken. We lost a great one. https://t.co/0gOJSbhYL2

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @samstein: Heartbroken and shaken up by the news of the death of our beloved colleague and one of the most important foreign correspondents in the field, Chris Dickey. 

https://t.co/fAnMMifNvq

text: Fox News anchor Neil Cavuto cut into a White House speech by President Trump to once again correct some mischaracterizations the president made, specifically over former President Obama’s economic record, which Cavuto noted was very solid https://t.co/xJ9Qobdu98

name: thedailybeast
text: In a new interview with Rachel Maddow set to air Thursday night on MSNBC, Mary Trump confirmed that she personally has heard her uncle, President Trump, use the “n-word” and anti-Semitic expressions https://t.co/OQtLhSws5a

name: thedailybeast
text: A top Trump campaign adviser recently appeared on the Russian-government funded TV network RT, which U.S. intelligence agencies have said plays a role in the Kremlin’s plans to undermine American democracy https://t.co/OGojoUheyz

name: thedailybeast
text: More than a dozen women who previously worked for the Washington Redskins say they suffered sexual harassment and verbal abuse while working for the NFL team in incidents ranging from 2006 to 2019 https://t.co/FVGRDZJjz1

name: thedailybeast
text: "He’s been played by Brad Pitt on SNL, his image has graced donuts, cookies, and [more,]" writes @alainademop. "Without trying—only by showing up to work and sharing facts—Dr. Fauci has reached the type of all-out idolization Trump so desperately craves." https://t.co/7bG5wRSI0k
